title: Merge branch 'nfsmaster208-refresh'
message:
Merge branch 'nfsmaster208-refresh'

Message from nfsmaster208:

Added support for 192kHz devices, doubled maximum FFT length choice, and
fixed support for landscape view musical note (pitch) view.

Known Issue: At maximum FFT length and Sample Rate settings, linear view
experiences a bug and does not display correctly.

Workaround: Please choose either logarithmic or note view at this high
(maximum) performance level.

Other changes:

Simplify Portrait Graph Context to 1D/2D

Provides users in portrait mode a simplified context for which to choose
between the spectrogram (2D) graph view and the spectrum (1D) graph
view. Landscape has more screen "real estate" to display the "spam" and
"spum" titles, which will show while switching between display
orientations.

Add in support for landscape note view.

Now it is possible to choose to access the Pitch view in landscape.

Make animation delay more responsive feeling.

Very minor change but helps the app feel slightly more responsive.

Note: The "refresh" branch is a pulled directly from the latest version of bewantbe/master and has only the real changes from PR #9, but in a much cleaner style.

title: Increase Max Sample/S & FFT Len, Minor UI Changes
message:
Increase Max Sample/S & FFT Len, Minor UI Changes

Added support for 192kHz devices, doubled maximum FFT length choice, and
fixed support for landscape view musical note (pitch) view.

Known Issue: At maximum FFT length and Sample Rate settings, linear view
experiences a bug and does not display correctly.

Workaround: Please choose either logarithmic or note view at this high
(maximum) performance level.

Other changes:
Simplify Portrait Graph Context to 1D/2D

Provides users in portrait mode a simplified context for which to choose
between the spectrogram (2D) graph view and the spectrum (1D) graph
view. Landscape has more screen "real estate" to display the "spam" and
"spum" titles, which will show while switching between display
orientations.

Add in support for landscape note view.
Now it is possible to choose to access the Pitch view in landscape.

Make animation delay more responsive feeling.
Very minor change but helps the app feel slightly more responsive.

title: Rewrite ScreenPhysicalMapping. Fix bug that label at boundary not show in Log mode.
message:
Rewrite ScreenPhysicalMapping. Fix bug that label at boundary not show in Log mode.

Add variables vLowerViewBound and vUpperViewBound to replace "zoom" and "shift".
This has the advantage that view boundary is now exact in the physical space, instead of exact in view port space (zoom, shift), hance fix the bug mentioned.

zoom, shift are cached for speed consideration.

Update User Manual Text and Preferences Context

gets rid of the Android Studio warning about 2.2.3.

title: Merge branch 'master' of…
message:
Merge branch 'master' of git://github.com/nfsmaster208/audio-analyzer-for-android into nfsmaster208-master

Conflicts:
	audioSpectrumAnalyzer/src/main/java/github/bewantbe/audio_analyzer_for_android/AnalyzerGraphic.java
	audioSpectrumAnalyzer/src/main/res/values/strings.xml

Massive merge. The pull are mostly directly following the hints in AS.

Please make commit more purpose specific instead of eliminating the yellow hints (they are sometimes non-desired).

Changes from pull request:
  FFTLibrary/build.gradle
      From what I understand in
        https://developer.android.com/studio/build/build-variants.html#build-types
      there is no need to add "debug" build type.

  build.gradle
      Still use version 2.2.3, prefer stable.

  gradle/wrapper/gradle-wrapper.properties
      Let me use the old version first.

  res/values/strings.xml
      Reworked. Do not make string "spum" "mon" "linear" resources like that, it can not be simply translated.

  res/values-sw600dp/strings.xml
  res/values-sw720dp-land/strings.xml
  res/values-v11/strings.xml
    I don't see the reason that adding those strings separately. Moved to values/strings.xml

For the code, some changes that hurt readability are ignored. e.g.
STFT.java:296
   double c = x2;
This line is intended to match the comment above describing the algorithm. Although for machine it is perfectly correct to replase c to x2 below.

Some changes that make (currently unused) public member function private are also ignored, there are there for potential public use.

message: Now setting of linear/log scaling of freq axis is saved.

title: Finer log plot.
message:
Finer log plot.

Increased segment to avoid getMaximumBitmapHeight limit.
Use energy average instead of dB average when doing interpolation in log plot.
Fix bug: Inverted axisFreq will cause incorrect log plot.
Fix bug: freq_lower_bound_for_log gives wrong value, (an integer).

title: SpectrogramPlot, now log axis plot can be archieve by segment-style BMP.
message:
SpectrogramPlot, now log axis plot can be archieve by segment-style BMP.

Experimenting logBmp, logSegBmp.

* ScreenPhysicalMapping::mapTypeInt -> mapType, relavent code now more clean.
* ScreenPhysicalMapping::setMappingType now update boundary value even when canvas is not ready. This fix a bug that can not set log mode at start.
* Use 1k, 10k to denote 1000 10000 in log scale view mode.
